channel.title: Where do i change Opcodes?
channel.description: Where do i change the opcodes? Im using Nrs3Server base and changing to a 732 cache.

item.title: Where do i change Opcodes?
item.dc:creator: @alexis1 alexis1
item.description:
@alexis1 wrote:

Here are the files you need if you already have the cache.

and everything compiles, but after its done fecthing updates the client crashes and says this,

item.title: Where do i change Opcodes?
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

itemdefinitions.java for both client sided and server sided

http://www.multiupload.nl/JS4GDO3SH5

this link has the files you need already done just copy paste from them 1 is client sided other is server sided you will no difference once you look at file names
